Package me.dessie.dessielib.inventoryapi.inventory

Class SingleInventory

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.inventoryapi.inventory.CustomInventory<T>
me.dessie.dessielib.inventoryapi.inventory.PaginatedInventory<SingleInventory>
me.dessie.dessielib.inventoryapi.inventory.SingleInventory
public class SingleInventory extends PaginatedInventory<SingleInventory>
Creates a CustomInventory that will be updated for all players that have it opened.

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleInventory

      public SingleInventory(int size, String name)
      Creates a new SingleInventory with the provided size and name. The size must be a multiple of 9, no greater than 54 and no less than 9. The name will automatically have any colors translated, including HEX colors. For example: "&bInventory #ffffffName" would result in "Inventory" being aqua, and "Name" being white.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the inventory.
      name - The name of the inventory.

    • handlesInventory

      public boolean handlesInventory(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
      Description copied from class: CustomInventory
      Checks if the provided inventory is handled by this instance. For instance, if the provided inventory was created by this custom inventory and should therefore change to the Inventory should also change this builder.
      Specified by:
      handlesInventory in class CustomInventory<SingleInventory>
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory to check handling for.
      Returns:
      If the provided inventory is updated by this instance.
